con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DrillischService
con:testCase.con:description: Tests good case scenarios for drillisch interface based on specification in SVN: svn://svn.sg.de.pri.o2.com/DealerPortal/DirectRecharge/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/Drillisch/ST_TD_DRC_U-036_Drillisch_Interface_Specification_for_Drillisch_V0.5.pdf
